actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Armed Services.

official_title: A bill to amend title 10 of the United States Code to eliminate the reduction made to retired or retainer pay, for purposes of providing a surviving spouse with an annuity under the Survivor Benefit Plan, during periods when the person entitled to such pay is unmarried.

summary.text: Eliminates the reduction made to retired or retainer pay, for purposes of providing a surviving spouse with an annuity under the Survivor Benefit Plan for Armed Services annuities during periods when the person entitled to such pay is unmarried.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 10 of the United States Code to eliminate the reduction made to retired or retainer pay, for purposes of providing a surviving spouse with an annuity under the Survivor Benefit Plan, during periods when the person entitled to such pay is unmarried.
